content: this pattern is super flexible and easy to follow trust me this was my first knitting project you can add or remove stitches and row as needed to get desired width and length this pattern can also be worked flat and sewn together at the seam 10 ply worsted yarn can also be used with 5 mm needles and casting on 48 stitches this pattern should be easy to understand and make but if you get stuck please don t hesitate to message me with any questions you may have about this or any of my patterns
